publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim

ab.title: Joshua 16
ab.l: Da čyḥty ol goral ulanlaryna Jośefniń Jard́enińd́ań Jeriḥonun suvlaryna Jeriḥonun mizraḥ sartyn ol midbar baryredi Jeriḥodan tavyna B́et́ Ėĺniń.
Da čyɣady B́et́ Ėĺd́ań Luzɣa da ašady č́egińa Arki ʿAtarotnun.
Da ėńadir maʿrav sary č́egińa Jafletiniń č́egińa d́ejiń B́et́ Ḥoronnun Taḥtonnun Ǵezer- ǵa d́ejiń da ėdiĺar čyɣyšlary maʿrav sary.
Da üĺuš́ aldylar ulanlary Jośef́niń Ḿenaše da Ėfrajim.
Da ėdi č́egi ulanlarynyn Ėfrajimniń uruvlary sajyn da ėdi č́egi üĺuš́ĺariniń mizraḥ sartyn ʿAtrot Adarɣa B́et́ Ḥoron Ėljonɣa d́ejiń.
Da čyḥty ol č́ek maʿrav sary ol Maḫmatta t́uš́ĺukt́ań da qajyryredi da ėńaredi Janoḥadan ʿAtarottan Naʿarataɣa ol č́ek mizraḥ sartyn Taʾanat Šiloɣa da ašty any mizraḥ sartyn Janoḥaɣa.
Da ėńaredi Janoḥadan ʿAtarot Naʿaratḥa da jet́aredi Jeriḥoda da čyɣaredi ol Jard́eńǵa.

Tapuaḥtan baryredi maʿrav sary
Naḥal Qanaɣa da ėdiĺar čyɣyslary maʿrav sary bu üĺuš́u šev́etiniń ulanlarynyn Ėfrajimniń uruvlary sajyn.
Da ol šahar- lar ol ajyrɣanlar ulanlaryna Ėfrajimniń ortasynda ü- ĺuš́ńuń ulanlarynyn Ḿenašeniń bar ol šaharlar da azbar- lary.
Da śurḿadiĺar ol Kenaʿanny ol olturuvču Ǵezerd́a da olturdu ol Kenaʿan ortasynda Ėfrajimniń ušpu ḱuńǵa d́ejiń da ėdi jasaḥ üč́uń qulluḥ ėt́ti.

app.note: Spelled מַכְמַת; Heb. מִּכְמְתׇת; cf. further Josh 17.10: Miḫmetatḥa.
The erroneously written fragment of Josh 16.7 has been left unvocalized and crossed out by the copyist.
F305-01: Qaneɣa; a scribal error. Cf. Heb. קָנָה .
